author: Joanne O'Brien
text: No option to leave zero stars . There is no customer services - just seems a never ending round of automated messages. I will probably not bother buying again - will go back to ebay - least I felt I had some backup as a buyer.

author: Peggie - your Benefits Platfor
text: I recently sold a pair of Valentino trainers, the buyer claimed they weren't authentic and opened a case for a refund, Vinted asked me for proof of purchase, either/and pictures of the trainers that weren’t included on the original listing as evidence of authenticity. I didn’t have proof of purchase as they were purchased by an ex partner and I didn’t have extra photos (because why would I?!) so they ruled the trainers not authentic, they refunded the buyer which I found extremely frustrating but I had the intention of getting the trainers officially authenticated and I would resell them. However, Vinted  advised the buyer they didn’t need to return the trainers! Which is absolutely appalling, the authenticity checks were so meagre, based purely on the buyers feedback! I have tried and tried to raise this with their customer care and legal team and have offered to pay for them to have the trainers returned and for them to perform a proper authenticity inspection and have been completely ignored. The trainers was originally £565 and the buyer got to keep these for free simply by saying they weren’t authentic.
title: High risk for selling designer goods

Vinted asked me to prove it which was impossible as the item was with the buyer who finally kept the pair of shoes for free after deliberately lying.I felt I was scammed and I was unable to do anything about it...

author: Tieto Mallamo
text:
Worst costumer care ever possible

author: HeavenIsHome
text:
Vinted have blocked my account over 10 times, each time have been for over 3 days and each time they have unblocked it and apologised. Most times were due to selling AUTHENTIC designer items. And I have provided a proof of certificate with the listing. 

There customer service team send undermining messages that are automated and robotic and never look into the item to see if its authentic. 

After they unblock my account they dint wipe away the strikes that they place against my account

Meaning that every time there robots block my account it is automatically permanently blocked.

Then the vinted customer service team refuse to look into my authentic item responding with automated responses and saying that they can't help me.

Even though I send proof of authenticity and certificates of authenticity 

To top it off, they keep me waiting days on end until someone stumbles along the claim and unblocks my account 

I am very happy to take legal action against vinted at this point. 

They damage my selling reputation everytime they block my account 

They restrict everything that helps a sale to run successfully, I cannot contact vinted about issues with confirmation of orders. Or reservation ends.

Becuase of the restrictions placed on my account I also cannot track my items goint or coming. I cannot see my orders that are pending.

This is the worst customer service I have experiance on over 10 occasions. 

And I have proof of every occasion that they have ignored me and blocked my account for no reason and they won't get away with it.

I have never been so upset with an app. And I type this review with true honesty 

If they fix these issues, get a completley new set of employees. Invest in a telephone then it would be a decent app.

But instead they hide behind a chat so they can't confront issues head on.

It's terrible
title: Do not use, taking legal action
